# tsuga_team (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "tsuga_team" "team" {
  name        = "my-team-name"
  description = "My team description"
  visibility  = "public"
  tags = [
    {
      key   = "billing_center"
      value = "product"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name to assign to the team
- `visibility` (String) Controls whether the resources of the team are discoverable by users

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `tags` (Attributes List) List of key/value tags applied to the resource (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier of the team

<a id="nestedatt--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Required:

- `key` (String)
- `value` (String)
